description: Surface nitrate extracted from World Ocean Atlas 2009 (WOA09), a set of objectively analyzed grids at 1Â° spatial resolution for the BCLME (Angola, Namibia, South Africa). Averaged climatological fields are produced  for annual, seasonal and monthly time scales from observed data of the ocean surface and subsurface profiles.
name: BCLME: World Ocean Atlas 2009 (Nitrate)
